name: Veggie Carrot and Dip for Easter
description: Snack-time thatâ€™s parent-approved and kid-fueled! After all the fun of Easter chocolates, switch gears with vibrant veggies creatively arranged into a giant carrot shape.  Serve with a cool, creamy ranch dip that ensures those little munchers stay veggie-happy all day long. Bonus: this dip has half the sodium of the bottled stuff at the store.
preparation: Mix all ingredients. Let stand for 1⁄2 hour before serving. Delicious with raw vegetables, potato chips, or crackers.

products.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix
summary: Go beyond your classic ranch dressing and create spreads, dips, or seasonings with this versatile blend!
